title: SKSvg.LoadContent(string svg)
body:
e.g. 
```cs
var svg = new SkiaSharp.Extended.SKSvg();
svg.LoadContent(@"<svg height=""100"" width=""100"">
  <circle cx=""50"" cy=""50"" r=""40"" stroke=""black"" stroke-width=""3"" fill=""red"" />
</svg> ");
```

comments.author: adverst

comments.body: SkSvg uses an XmlReader that has custom settings by default. We should be able to use it by default.
